notes:
Appears during the [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary]], in a raid at a random time once a day.

Before Skyrr appears, two messages are broadcast to the [[Game Worlds|server]]:
* '''A groupie has appeared on the snow mountain southwest of Svargrond. She's chanting "Skyrr, Skyrr"...'''
* 20 minutes later: '''Skyrr is raging south-west of Svargrond.'''
sounds: You will all die out here.
name: Skyrr (Creature)
strategy:
Kill him and his summons quickly!
[[File:Tibia's 15th Anniversary! 13 Skyrr!|thumb|300px|right|Fight against Skyrr]]
